title: Optimize and compress images
description:
Compress existing images (target 80% smaller). Convert to WebP with JPEG fallback. The 3MB bike erg image should become ~200-300KB. Add build process for automated optimization.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

title: Improve blog post typography
description:
Increase line-height to 1.5-1.6. Add letter-spacing on headings. Improve blockquote styling with left border accent. Add prominent date display and back-to-posts link.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

description: Update dune-project to add bisect_ppx as dev dependency and regenerate .opam file. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Redesign the website
description: Redesign the website to more creative and interactive and mobile / desktop ready. Do all the work under a feature umbrella

title: Add PR comment workflow
description: Post coverage diff comment on pull requests using actions/github-script. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Add Jekyll build step with dynamic baseurl
Add PR comment step with preview URL
Performance testing and optimization
description:
Test and optimize to hit targets: First contentful paint < 1 second, total page weight < 500KB (non-map pages), Lighthouse performance score 95+. Inline critical CSS. Test on real devices.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

description: Add (instrumentation (backend bisect_ppx)) to lib/dune, bin/dune, and test/dune. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

description: Configure peaceiris/actions-gh-pages to push _coverage/ to gh-pages branch on push to master. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Implement responsive images
description:
Add srcset for responsive image serving. Serve smaller images on mobile. Add lazy loading with native loading=lazy attribute. Fade-in animation on load. Aspect-ratio placeholders to prevent layout shift.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

title: Create GitHub Actions workflow file with PR triggers
Add deployment to orphan branch using peaceiris/actions-gh-pages
Enhance code blocks
description:
Add syntax highlighting with minimal palette. Subtle border-radius (2-4px). Copy-to-clipboard button on hover. Horizontal scroll indicator for mobile.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

title: Add cleanup job for PR close
Redesign homepage and navigation
description:
Refined header with name as logo-mark. Navigation with hover transitions (150ms), active state indicators, better spacing. Post list with inline dates and hover states. Minimal footer.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

title: Extract map data to JSON
description:
Move the 96 marker locations from inline JavaScript to a separate JSON file. Cleaner code, better caching. Lazy-load Mapbox JS only on travels page.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

title: Add coverage badges to README
description: Insert line and branch coverage shields.io badges that link to GitHub Pages report. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Rewrite the 'Exploring agentic ideas right now' blog post
description: Rewrite the post to emphasize that all the work was done through agents - I didn't write a single line of code. The key insight: the meta skill of the future will be how to guide and orchestrate agents, not principally how to write code.

title: Add badge JSON generation
description: Script in CI to parse bisect-ppx-report summary and write shields.io-compatible JSON files for line and branch coverage. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Enhance travels map UX
description:
Add marker clustering at low zoom. Smoother popup transitions (fade in). Larger tap targets for mobile. Custom minimal marker style. Optional continent filter buttons. Reset view button.

See design: docs/plans/2026-01-22-website-redesign-design.md

title: Deploy test site on each pull request opened
Move all the multicast_*.ml files out of bin and into lib
Implement responsive breakpoints
description:
Add breakpoint system: Small (<640px), Medium (640-1024px), Large (>1024px). Mobile-specific adjustments: larger tap targets (44px min), base font 17-18px on small screens, comfortable margins.

title: Improve travels map mobile experience
description:
Better touch handling (pinch-to-zoom, pan). Full viewport height minus header. Popup positioning that doesn't get cut off. Keyboard navigation for accessibility.

Add light/dark theme toggle in footer. Smooth animation on toggle, respects prefers-color-scheme, persists preference in localStorage.
